column4: how do you "replace" gaim by pidgin? when apt-get remove gaim is done, it uninstalls ubuntu-desktop too!
ubuntu-desktop removal is not a big deal as its simply a meta package bringing together otherwise unlinked debs
i'm not sure about ubuntu-desktop .. thought it's all what the gnome part is ?

no .... it is simply a list of otherwise independant packages listed to be installed together ... if you decide you want to remove any one of them then ubuntu-desktop gets removed too but it has no effect
